com.alvermont.terraj.stargen
Class GenStar

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.stargen.GenStar

public class GenStar
extends java.lang.Object

Random star generation with realistic, mass, luminosity and spectral class. Converted to Java from public domain C code written by Andrew Folkins

Version:
$Id: GenStar.java,v 1.14 2006/07/06 06:58:33 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

          Compute a cumulative distribution from the values in StarCounts[][] by adding up all the values, then dividing each entry in the array by the total.

computeProbabilitiesByClass

protected void computeProbabilitiesByClass()
Compute the table of probabilities by class

computeProbabilities

protected void computeProbabilities()
Compute a cumulative distribution from the values in StarCounts[][] by adding up all the values, then dividing each entry in the array by the total.

setSeed

protected void setSeed(long seed)
Set the seed of the random number object

Parameters:
seed - The new seed value to be used

generateStar

public Primary generateStar(int magClass,
                            int specClass)
Generate and return a new random star of a particlar magnitude and spectral class

Parameters:
magClass - The magnitude class of the desired star
specClass - The spectral class of the desired star
Returns:
A randomly generated star of the specified class

generateStar

public Primary generateStar()
Generate and return a new star according to the probability distribution calculated from the data tables in this class

Returns:
A randomly generated star object

generateStar

public Primary generateStar(java.lang.String specClass)
Generate a star given a text format spectral class

Parameters:
specClass - The desired spectral class of the star to be generated.
Returns:
A randomly generated star of the specified spectral class. An IllegalArgumentException is thrown if the spectral class is not one of those known to this class.

generateStar

public Primary generateStar(int specClass)
Generate and return a new random star of a particlar spectral class

Parameters:
specClass - The spectral class of the desired star
Returns:
A randomly generated star of the specified class
